page.title: 10PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content:
Public Transport is very cheap in our area, because South Yorkshire county council subsidises it from the rates and our buses are the cheapest in Britain.Therefore a lot of people use buses as a main form of transport.We surveyed 100 people in our area and asked them to answer Questions on transport.Here are our results: 72% had a car and 28% didn't. 24% had other types of transport.4% had a motorbike,68% had a bicycle.100% used some form of public transport.92% used buses.40% of the people used a bus most.60% used a car most.12% of the people had a caravan,88% didn't
By John Coldicutt Matthew Clarke Steven Farnell Noel Soulsby
